name: WOP COIN
description: Launched in December 2024, $WOP is a deflationary Meme Coin project that is positioned at the intersection of Crypto, Pop and Hip Hop Culture. Our objective is to leverage leading edge blockchain technologies, such as the Token-2022 program, to deliver innovative crypto solutions, whilst simultaneously providing a fun community for people to connect and share their love of Meme's, Pop, and Hip Hop.
